docs.lead_paragraph: HE cannot think about it without irritation. He was loath to go on at any length. Frankly, he was sick of it. ''We talk about it all the time,'' he says. ''We're in the papers on a daily basis. How could you not talk about it?'' The man is an executive at E. F. Hutton. The ''it'' is the check-kiting scam that has recently engulfed the brokerage firm.
